**2023-04-05 / @adonovan, @ianlancetaylor, @julieqiu, @rsc**

**Accepted**

- **context: add AfterFunc** [#57928](https://go.dev/issue/57928)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto/x509: add android user trusted CA folder as a possible source for certificate retrieval** [#58922](https://go.dev/issue/58922)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **go/ast, go/build/constraint: support for per-file Go versions using //go:build lines** [#59033](https://go.dev/issue/59033)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net/http: add ErrSchemeMismatch** [#44855](https://go.dev/issue/44855)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **runtime: use WER for GOTRACEBACK=wer on Windows** [#57441](https://go.dev/issue/57441)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **slices: add DeleteFunc** [#54768](https://go.dev/issue/54768)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/oauth2: Add RFC 6749 error fields to RetrieveError** [#58125](https://go.dev/issue/58125)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **all: remove GOARM=5** [#58686](https://go.dev/issue/58686)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **cmd/go: add "go mod audit" subcommand** [#54443](https://go.dev/issue/54443)
  - declined as infeasible
- **cmd/go: add go work toggle flag (impossible?)** [#57090](https://go.dev/issue/57090)
  - declined as infeasible
- **fmt: improve ergonomics of fmt.Print-like functions** [#57816](https://go.dev/issue/57816)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **html: optimize EscapeString and UnescapeString with avx instructions** [#53410](https://go.dev/issue/53410)
  - declined as infeasible
- **io: io.MultiReader should read until the buffer is full or there are no Readers left** [#57750](https://go.dev/issue/57750)
  - declined as infeasible
- **os/exec: Add ability to limit or prohibit the use of spawning subprocess'** [#54621](https://go.dev/issue/54621)
  - declined as infeasible
- **unicode/utf8: rune count in a valid UTF-8 string** [#57896](https://go.dev/issue/57896)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
